urls.description: Stay up to date with Singapore Airlines flights on your mobile devices. To start receiving flight updates via SMS and email, provide us with your contact details under Manage Booking. Alternatively, connect with us on on your preferred direct messaging apps and we'll let you know of any flight retiming before your departure. Get flight status updates on arrivals and departures
